com.bigdata.rwstore

Class RWWriteCacheService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bigdata.io.writecache.WriteCacheService
      • com.bigdata.rwstore.RWWriteCacheService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IWriteCache, IWriteCacheManager

    public class RWWriteCacheService
extends WriteCacheService
implements IWriteCacheManager
    Defines the WriteCacheService to be used by the RWStore.
    Author:
    mgc

    • Method Detail

      • canCompact

        protected final boolean canCompact()
        The scattered write cache supports compaction.
        Overrides:
        canCompact in class WriteCacheService

      • newWriteCache

        public WriteCache newWriteCache(IBufferAccess buf,
                                boolean useChecksum,
                                boolean bufferHasData,
                                IReopenChannel<? extends Channel> opener,
                                long fileExtent)
                         throws InterruptedException
        Provide default WriteCache.FileChannelScatteredWriteCache.

        Note: This is used by the unit tests, but not by the RWStore.

        Specified by:
        newWriteCache in class WriteCacheService
        Parameters:
        buf - The backing buffer (optional).
        useChecksum - true iff record level checksums are enabled.
        bufferHasData - true iff the buffer has data to be written onto the local persistence store (from a replicated write).
        opener - The object which knows how to re-open the backing channel (required).
        fileExtent - The then current extent of the backing file.
        Returns:
        A WriteCache wrapping that buffer and able to write on that channel.
        Throws:
        InterruptedException

      • removeWriteToAddr

        public boolean removeWriteToAddr(long address,
                                 int latchedAddr)
        Specified by:
        removeWriteToAddr in interface IWriteCacheManager
